name: ENTANGLED SOULS
description:
Who can really forgive that sin?

In a nightmare of madness, she searches for abominable memories.

This is a horror action adventure game that can be played with simple movement controls and a single button.

There are no lines or sentences. You can play regardless of your location or language.

The hero is vulnerable and has no fighting skills. He makes his way through the enemy's attacks.

Solve the riddles scattered throughout the stage and collect items to reach the true ending.

E key:Action Button

Q key:Option Menu

For those who distribute

There are no restrictions, but please link to the store page and the creator's X(twitter) in the description section of the distribution.
